#summary Frequently Asked Questions

==== Introduction ====

There are no Frequently Asked Questions yet. Over time this page will gradually be filled with FAQ's that reach us (for example from the [User group] of pchart4mw).

==== FAQ ====
<dl>
<dt>*Q: I only see a blank (transparant) image?*</dt>
<dd>A: This can happen when pChart4mw does not receive any data. Make sure there is data in the chart definition and that the data is properly separated with line-breaks.</dd>
</dl>
